name: Dralmorrer Borngray
languages: Common, Bullywug, Draconic, Elvish, Goblin, Sylvan

special_abilities.name: Fey Ancestry.
descriptions: Dralmorrer has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put him to sleep.

special_abilities.name: Spellcasting.
descriptions: Dralmorrer is a 7th-level spellcaster that uses Intelligence as his spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). Dralmorrer has the following spells prepared from the wizard spell list:
* Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, prestidigitation, shocking grasp
* 1st level (4 slots): longstrider, magic missile, shield, thunderwave
* 2nd level (2 slots): magic weapon, misty step

special_abilities.name: War Magic.
descriptions: When Dralmorrer uses his action to cast a cantrip, he can also take a bonus action to make one weapon attack.

special_abilities.name: Weapon Bond.
descriptions: Provided his longsword is on the same plane Dralmorrer can take a bonus action to teleport it to his hand.

actions.name: Multiattack.
descriptions: Dralmorrer attacks twice, either with his longsword or dagger.

actions.name: Longsword.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Dagger.
descriptions: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or ranged 20 ft./60 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage.
